name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard J. WILLIAMS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard J. WILLIAMS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John P. Lawler, Stroudsburg, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 922
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard J. WILLIAMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 28, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Reargument Denied Jan. 20, 1983.
John P. Lawler, Stroudsburg, for appellant.
James P. Marsh, Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
